text: - Hypertelorism - Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy - Low-set, posteriorly rotated ears - Macrocephaly - Pectus excavatum of inferior sternum - Ptosis - Pulmonic stenosis - Scoliosis - Short neck - Short stature - Sparse eyebrow - Thick lower lip vermilion - Ventricular septal defect - Webbed neck - Wide intermamillary distance - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
